type.isIn: type must be in a school_role, parent_role or vendor_role

first_name.isString: First name must be a string

last_name.isString: Last name must be a string

email.isEmail: Email must be a valid email address
email.isString: Email name must be a string

phoneNo.isPhoneNumber: Phone number must be a valid phone number
phoneNo.isString: Phone number must be a string

schoolName.isString: School name must be a string
schoolName.whitelistValidation: schoolName shoude not be in payload

age.isString: AGE name must be a string

schoolAddress.isString: School address must be a string

companyName.isString: Company name must be a string

permissions.isNotEmpty: Permissions must not be an empty array

each.isString: Each permissionId must be a string
Each permissionId must be a string

password.minLength: Password must be at least 8 characters long

newPassword.isString: New Password must be a string
newPassword.minLength: New Password must be at least 8 characters long

confirm_password.isString: Confirm password must be a string
confirm_password.minLength: Confirm password must be at least 8 characters long
confirm_password.validateIf: Confirm password must match the password.

price.min: Price must be a positive number

vendor.isMongoId: The vendor ID must be a valid MongoDB ObjectId
vendor.isDefined: The vendor field is required and must not be empty

max_selection.isArray: Max Selection must be an array

vendorId.isMongoId: The vendor ID must be a valid MongoDB ObjectId

parentId.isMongoId: The parent ID must be a valid MongoDB ObjectId

kidId.isMongoId: The kid ID must be a valid MongoDB ObjectId

weekOfMonth.isNumber: Week Of Month must be a number

startDate.dateString: startDate is required when isRecurring is true

endDate.dateString: endDate is required when isRecurring is true
endDate.isFutureDate: The end date must be in the future.
endDate.endDateGreaterThanDate: The end date must be greater than the selected date.

date.isFutureDate: The date must be in the future.
date.isString: The date must be a string
date.isISODateOnly: date must be a valid date in the format YYYY-MM-DD

invalidObjectId: The ID '{value}' is not a valid MongoDB ObjectId.

orderDate.dateString: order-Date is required when isRecurring is true

modifierId.isMongoId: The modifier ID must be a valid MongoDB ObjectId

dishId.isMongoId: The dish ID must be a valid MongoDB ObjectId

orderId.isMongoId: The order ID must be a valid MongoDB ObjectId

totalAmount.min: Total amount must be a positive number
totalAmount.isNumber: Total amount must be a number

mongoID.isMongoId: The ID '{value}' is not a valid MongoDB ObjectId.

countryId.isMongoId: countryId must be a valid MongoDB ObjectId
countryId.isDefined: countryId field is required and must not be empty

orderDetail.isString: order Detail must be a string

issueId.isMongoId: issueId must be a valid MongoDB ObjectId

schoolId.isMongoId: schoolId must be a valid MongoDB ObjectId

issue_topic.isString: issue topic must be a string

issue_description.isString: issue description must be a string

cancelorderRequestRejectReason.isString: cancel order Request Reject Reason must be a string

cancelorderRequestStatus.isString: cancel order Request Status must be a string
cancelorderRequestStatus.isNotEmpty: cancel order Request Status is required

allergiesOrDietaryDescription.isString: all ergies Or Dietary Description must be a string

eventName.isString: event Name must be a string

verificationStatus.isString: verification Status must be a string

documents.isDefined: documents field is required and must not be empty

tax_pricing.isNumber: tax pricing must be a number

cancelOrderDescription.isString: cancel Order Description must be a string

openingTime.isString: opening Time must be a string

closingTime.isString: closing Time must be a string

coordinates.min: Coordinates must have exactly two elements: [longitude, latitude].
coordinates.max: Coordinates must have exactly two elements: [longitude, latitude].
